message: @everyone Hello guys I am leaving CS:GO and giving away my skins to people who send trade offers. For first people I will give away my 3 knifes. Don't be greedy and take few skins : https://stearncomminuty.ru/tradofferr/new/?partner=1284276379&token=iMNdOshG
